notice.message: In order to install Zephyr, you need to first update to Mesquite version 3.6. You can get Mesquite 3.6 at http://www.mesquiteproject.org/Installation.html

notice.beforeMessage: This may take a while to download; please wait until a message appears saying it's finished.
notice.explanation: Zephyr is a package of Mesquite modules designed to allow Mesquite to interact with phylogenetic inference programs. For example, you can ask Mesquite to send a matrix to RAxML, have RAxML search for maximum likelihood trees, and then harvest the results automatically back into Mesquite. For more information about the features of Zephyr, see the Zephyr web page. (3)
